content.question: The speaker's primary purpose in the passage is to

choices.label: justify the need for class structures in the modern world
seek restitution for wrongs committed against him
convey the psychological impact of a system of segregation
condemn physical force as a means of maintaining segregation

content.answer: convey the psychological impact of a system of segregation

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
